nodes.text: The Raddakkia Plaza was a public area on the planet Troithe which featured the Taa Complex, a greenhouse with rooftop gardens, and drift platforms which allowed individuals to walk about above the plaza. During the fighting between the governing Galactic Empire and the opposing New Republic around 5 ABY, Acting Governor Fara Yadeez of Troithe and Colonel Soran Keize of the Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing regularly walked along the drift platforms. A memorial also took place at the Taa Complex for the deceased 204th pilot Garmen Naadra.
The Raddakkia Plaza appeared in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
